Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's Debut
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Duke O'Dowd and his transformation into the Human Meteor, setting the stage for his superheroic adventures and initial confrontation with suspicious activities at the waterfront.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction and Origin
sub_scenes.description: The comic book cover and initial summary introduce the Human Meteor, his alter ego Duke O'Dowd, and his underwater setting, creating the first impression for the reader.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Following
sub_scenes.description: Duke, as a taxi driver, picks up wealthy passengers heading to the waterfront, becoming suspicious of a sedan following his taxi, hinting at impending danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Following

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Call to Action
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into the Human Meteor after dropping off passengers, reacting to the suspicious sedan and preparing to take action, shifting the narrative towards superheroics.

Major_Arcs.title: The Yacht Marlin Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Human Meteor's investigation into the suspicious sedan and a potential conspiracy involving a yacht, leading him to confront the occupants and uncover deeper criminal activities.

sub_scenes.title: Street Confrontation and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: The Human Meteor confronts the sedan occupants, leading to a fight and the arrival of police, suggesting initial attempts to handle the situation through direct action.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Yacht Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: In the hospital, a police officer reveals suspicions about a yacht and a person named Holder, shifting the focus of investigation towards maritime elements.

sub_scenes.title: Stowaway Plan and Hidden Observer
sub_scenes.description: Duke, back in civilian clothes, plans to stow away on the yacht, while a hidden observer is revealed, adding layers of intrigue and parallel actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Stowaway Plan and Radio Message

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck Duties and Cabin Intrusion
sub_scenes.description: Pete, working on the yacht, becomes curious and decides to investigate a cabin, setting up a sequence of discovery and danger on the yacht itself.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Duties and Cabin Investigation

Major_Arcs.title: Toby's Underwater Mission and Japanese Submarine
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Toby's underwater mission, revealing a sunken Japanese submarine and a torpedo resupply operation, escalating the stakes to international espionage and wartime threats.

sub_scenes.title: Mission Briefing and Underwater Descent
sub_scenes.description: Toby receives his mission briefing and dives into the water, initiating his underwater investigation near a passenger ship.

sub_scenes.title: Discovery of Sunken Submarine and Enemy Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Underwater, Toby discovers a sunken Japanese submarine and encounters an enemy diver, revealing a hidden enemy operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Sunken Submarine and Enemy Diver

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Fight and Submarine Escape
sub_scenes.description: Toby, discovered by enemy divers, engages in an underwater fight while the enemy submarine prepares a hasty escape, escalating the conflict and urgency.

Major_Arcs.title: Namor's Underwater Fury and Peter's Treachery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Namor, who intervenes with a torpedo attack, confronts the ship crew, and uncovers Peter's betrayal, revealing deeper layers of conspiracy and personal stakes.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Torpedo Attack and Ship Alarm
sub_scenes.description: Namor attacks the submarine with a torpedo and then shifts his focus to the ship, causing alarm and chaos on deck.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Pursuit of the Ship and Need for Air

sub_scenes.title: Surface Confrontation and Peter's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Namor surfaces, boards the yacht, learns of Peter's death, and then uncovers Peter's treachery with the depth map, resolving the yacht mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor Surfaces and Learns of Peter's Death
Discovery of Depth Map and Peter's Treachery Revealed

sub_scenes.title: Urgent Departure and Hospital Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Namor and Toby make an urgent departure and visit the hospital for recovery updates, transitioning from action to aftermath and care.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to the Liberty Lads fighting Nazi spies, leading to an ambulance scene, a dropped wallet, and a garage investigation, initiating a new mystery related to espionage.

sub_scenes.title: Street Combat with Nazi Fiends
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads engage in direct combat against Nazi enemies on the streets, setting a scene of immediate wartime action.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Combat Against Enemies

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Dropped Wallet
sub_scenes.description: An ambulance arrives, and boys observe an injured man being taken away, followed by the discovery of a dropped wallet leading to a new investigative path.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Arrival and Discovery of Injured Man
The Dropped Wallet and the Garage Address
The Marine Salute and Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Garage Encounter and Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: The boys arrive at the garage, encounter a police officer, and are led inside to meet the menacing Mr. Horst, escalating tension and danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Police Officer at the Garage
Inside the Garage and the Order to Wait
The Abrupt Arrival of Mr. Horst

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Carbon Monoxide Plot and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys about the wallet while Major Bronson reveals a sinister carbon monoxide plot, which is then interrupted by Horst's betrayal, leading to chaos.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Sabotage Plans and Barracks Attack
sub_scenes.description: The boys escape, discover sabotage plans, and the Marine Barracks come under attack, linking the garage events to a larger espionage plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Marine Counter-Attack and Spy Ring Defeat
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, confront the attackers, and ultimately dismantle the Nazi spy ring, resolving the immediate threat and celebrating victory.

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South American Ambush
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Champ and Henry in a new South American setting, facing an ambush and getting entangled in a mystery involving President Rosita's daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Desert Ambush and Town Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are ambushed in a desert landscape but manage to reach a South American town, seeking refuge or further adventure.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in a South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Soldier Interrogation and Flashback
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are confronted and interrogated by soldiers about President Rosita's daughter, with a flashback hinting at past confusing encounters with authorities.

sub_scenes.title: Escape Attempt and Explanation of Kidnapping
sub_scenes.description: Champ attempts to escape and seek help, while soldiers explain Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre, clarifying the reason for their actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and Plan to Seek Consul
Explanation: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre's Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Rosita's Rescue from El Tigre
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the rescue mission to save Rosita, involving mistaken identities, infiltration, combat, and ultimately, a successful rescue operation.

sub_scenes.title: Abduction and Mistaken Identity
sub_scenes.description: Two men are abducted and taken to Mama, who mistakenly believes they are rescuers of Rosita, setting up a scenario of mistaken identity.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: A plan is formed to infiltrate El Tigre's hideout at Tamale Street, leading to a stealthy infiltration operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and Sock Attack

sub_scenes.title: Barrel Interrogation and El Tigre's Agenda
sub_scenes.description: Amidst minor conflicts, interrogation for Rosita's location begins, and El Tigre reveals his own agenda against Axis agents, adding complexity to the rescue mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
El Tigre's Concern about Name Misuse

sub_scenes.title: News of Rosita's Location and Immediate Rescue
sub_scenes.description: News of Rosita's location reaches Tigre, prompting an immediate and urgent rescue mission against Axis agents holding her captive.

narrative_arcs.title: Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Plan

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Combat and Rosita's Gratitude
sub_scenes.description: Intense combat ensues at the hotel, leading to Rosita's rescue and her expression of gratitude, marking the successful conclusion of the rescue operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Maid's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Ordeal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, where he faces combat, capture, torture, and ultimately an unexpected alliance with native tribes.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat, followed by a shift to an office setting where a hostage situation and a demand for sub detector plans are revealed.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan infiltrates the jungle, but his heightened senses warn him of an impending threat, culminating in an overwhelming native ambush.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Forced Compliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured, interrogated, and brutally tortured for plans, leading to his forced compliance and handover of the sought-after documents.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Arson, and Native Huts Fire
sub_scenes.description: Dolan escapes, seemingly causing chaos and fire, while natives' huts are intentionally set ablaze, further complicating the jungle situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Office Confrontation, Chase, and Fire Start
Grauer's Plan and Native Huts Fire
Intentional Arson and Dolan in Flames

Major_Arcs.title: Dolan's Alliance with Natives and Captain Lawton's Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc sees Dolan forming an alliance with natives after fighting them, and Captain Lawton's storyline concludes with a barroom brawl and Dolan receiving a spanking for his actions.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is ambushed again, but after a fight and the chief's death, he forms an unexpected alliance with the natives, shifting from enemy to ally.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma, Brawl, and Spanking
sub_scenes.description: Captain Lawton faces a dilemma and a barroom brawl ensues, culminating in Captain Lawton spanking Dolan as a form of discipline and affection.

narrative_arcs.title: Barroom Brawl - Taste of American Lead
Order Rescinded, Shore Leave, and Dolan's Deed

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins Investigate the Reilly Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them to uncover a racketeering plot and a desperate need for blood donation.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins and New Case
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins story and their new case: investigating the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on the Reilly Case

sub_scenes.title: Police HQ and Hospital Lead
sub_scenes.description: The Twins head to police headquarters and then the hospital, following a lead about Tom Reilly's sick child, directing their investigation towards personal connections.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly
Encounter with the Sick Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Blood Transfusion Plea and Racketeer Connection
sub_scenes.description: The twins discover Miss Reilly's critical need for a rare blood type, linking the case to racketeer Farnacci, escalating the stakes beyond a simple murder mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Miss Reilly's Medical Needs and Farnacci's Blood
Heading to the Irish Section for Tom Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Search for Tom Reilly and Mrs. Murphy's Confession
sub_scenes.description: The twins search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section and then visit Mrs. Murphy, who reveals Farnacci took the blame for something to secure a blood transfusion for her daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Continuing the Search and Hearing Whispers
Meeting Mrs. Murphy and the Confession
Farnacci's Mob Threat and Mr. Murphy's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ambush and Dan's Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: A taxi ambush occurs at Murphy's house, prompting Dan to pursue the shooters, escalating the danger and action.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Hospital Emergency, and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Shooters are apprehended, the injured are rushed to the hospital, and the community rallies to donate blood for Tom Reilly, demonstrating solidarity and resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion Need
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Lassie's Birthday
sub_scenes.description: Plan to arrest Farnacci is set, police raid a poolroom leading to an arrest, and the story concludes with a birthday celebration for Lassie Reilly, signifying a happy ending and community resilience.
